node.name: Goanna Studio - Static Analysis for C/C++
node.shortdescription:
Create Code Confidence with Goanna Studio.

Goanna Studio is the leading next generation static analysis tool for C/C++ source code that finds deep code deficiencies automatically at development time.

Goanna Studio is a fast, scalable and precise static code analysis solution that detects bugs and other software vulnerabilities automatically at development time, saving money and helping keep product launch timetables on track.

Available online for a FREE trial from Red Lizard Software www.RedLizards.com.

New:


  • even more intuitive GUI

  • whole-program analysis

  • over 100 check classes

  • incremental analysis

  • analyze single files or whole projects

Targeted for projects managed by CDT 4.0 or higher.

Why Goanna Studio? Because it blends in with its environment and eats bugs.

About Red Lizard Software -- www.RedLizards.com

Red Lizard Software is the first company to combine the technologies of static analysis and model checking to create a unique static analysis solution. The analysis is performed quickly, does not require test cases or even fully developed code, reports bugs precisely and has one unique goal: bringing higher quality software to market faster.

Goanna Studio is the leading next generation static analysis tool for C/C++ source code that finds deep code deficiencies automatically at development time.
